Welcome to the Remixed Dungeon Wiki!

This wiki provides comprehensive information for both players and modders of Remixed Dungeon, an open-source roguelike with pixel-art graphics and multilingual localization.

For Players

  • Remixed Dungeon Main Page - Game overview and introduction
  • Changelog - What's new in recent updates
  • Playable Classes - Details about all character classes
  • Items - List of items with descriptions and effects
  • Enemies - Information about creatures in the dungeon
  • Game Mechanics - How different systems work
  • Spells - Special abilities and spell mechanics
  • Challenges - Customization options and difficulty settings
  • FAQ - Frequently asked questions
  • Tips for New Players - Getting started guide

For Modders

  • Modding Introduction - Getting started with modding
  • JSON Configuration Files - How to create and modify configs
  • Creating Custom Items - Guide to adding new items
  • Creating Custom Mobs - Guide to adding new monsters
  • Modding Possibilities - What can be modded
  • Lua Scripts - Using Lua for advanced modding
  • Tiled Maps - Creating custom levels with Tiled

Game Content

  • Branches and Special Areas - Explore unique dungeon sections
  • Equipment System - How equipment and dual wielding work
  • Localization - Translating the game to new languages
  • Fan Art - Community artwork

Community

  • Join Our Discord - Discuss the game with other players
  • Fan Stories - Stories written by the community
  • Player Statistics - How people play our game

Our main project is Remixed Dungeon open source roguelike with pixel-art graphics and multilingual localization.

You can download it from Google Play or from Changelog page.

YouTube Channel - Check out our gameplay videos

Эта wiki на русском языке

Please note, English is not native for some wiki authors. So if you see any mistake or awkward phrase feel free to fix it (this is a wiki after all)
